See this post for additional details.

PhotonvisionLib LabVIEW 2024 beta released NI LabVIEW
PhotonVision Lib LabVIEW has been updated for the 2024 version of photonvision. While this has been tested against the 2024.3.1 beta release of photonvision it has not been tested against the 2024 LabVIEW libraries. As such consider it a Beta. The install files can be found here.
